DOC.brief_title: The Immediate Effects Thoracic Transverse Mobilization Patients With Primary Complaint Mechanical Neck Pain : A Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: Recruitment convenience sample via referral local physical therapist flyer post university campus . Participants assign either transverse vertebral pressure mobilization group control group . Inclusion criterion mobilization group 1 ) age 18 60 , 2 ) mechanical neck pain define pain exacerbated movement . Among exclusion criterion unexplained night pain , unexplained weight loss , numbness tingle arm and/or leg , balance coordination problem , morning stiffness last great one hour , history whiplash injury within six week treatment , diagnosis osteoporosis , symptom suggestive nerve root compression , prior cervical thoracic spine surgery , pending legal action . Inclusion criterion control group 1 ) age 18 60 , 2 ) asymptomatic neck thoracic region previous six year subject report . The latter group label `` control '' sense allow blind rater rather sense sham treatment group . The project approve University Puget Sound Institutional Review Board , write informed consent obtain subject . Outcome Measures Outcomes interest active neck motion , pressure pain threshold ( PPT ) report pain . For active range motion , single bubble inclinometer ( MIE Inclinometer , Medical Research Ltd , London , UK ) use measure flexion , extension , side-flexion subject seat . Since measurement rotation inclinometer would introduce change sit position , universal goniometer choose measure rotation . De Koning et al conduct systematic review seat inclinometry quantify active cervical ROM . Interrater intraclass correlation coefficient ( ICCs ) flexion , extension lateral flexion vary 0.81 0.94 healthy subject 0.68 0.86 neck pain . Among patient mechanical neck pain , ICCs cervical rotation use universal goniometer sit report 0.77 right 0.57 left.12 In order consider motion change , require statistical significance ≤ 0.01 difference degree ≥5 . Before commence study , one researcher participate training session follow intra-rater reliability test ROM measurement . PPT , minimum pressure induces pain , measure right lateral epicondyle use hand-held digital algometer ( Model FPX 25 , Wagner Instruments , Greenwich CT. ) Three measurement take separate 10 second interval , mean trial use analysis . Good excellent reproducibility , intra-rater inter-rater reliability PPT reported.13-15 However , Prushansky et al report significant difference raters prompt recommendation PPT measurement perform rater utilized outcome measure . We follow recommendation . An 11-point numerical pain rating scale ( NPRS ) use ass pain intervention . Cleland et al report psychometric property NPRS specific neck pain cohort 137 patient . Test-retest reliability moderate ( ICC=.76 ; CI , .51-.87 ) . The minimum clinically important difference neck pain study change 1.3 point . In study , select requirement 1.5-point change clinical importance . Study Protocol After determine eligibility , baseline ROM PPT score take one blinded rater , subject complete NPRS . The mobilization group treat non-thrust transverse vertebral pressure describe Maitland . The patient lay prone arm side `` forehead rest position '' . Pressures apply spinal level T1 T4 . The spinous process T1 identify first locate C6 use cervical extension method17 count caudally . The researcher stand level vertebra mobilize one side subject . The pad researcher 's non-dominant thumb place contact lateral aspect spinous process T1 , dominant thumb place dorsal side thumb . Pressure apply spinous process produce small amplitude , low velocity oscillation resistance end-range vertebra ( Grades IV IV+ ) . This procedure perform 30 second , sequentially apply next caudal level T4 . The pattern application use subject 's contralateral side . The entire procedure repeat total 8 minute . This follow repeat outcome measurement . The control group receive treatment . Each control subject assume prone position 8 minute use mobilization group outcome measurement repeat . The researcher perform outcome measurement blind group assignment . All subject clothe localized residual evidence thoracic manual contact visible . Statistical Analyses Data analyze SPSS , Version 14.0 ( SPSS , Inc , Chicago IL ) . We compare pre-intervention data transverse mobilization group control group utilize independent t-tests ROM PPT , Mann-Whitney test NPRS score . We compare pre post session measurement within group utilize pair t-tests ROM PPT , Wilcoxon signed-ranks test NPRS score .
